players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed, so the mafia is clearly among us. Diana was silent, which is suspicious. We need to pressure everyone to speak up."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Diana, we need to vote him out."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Diana, vote with me to win this."
You: "Charlie is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she's the mafioso. Charlie is trying to frame me to protect his partner."

Diana: "I'm innocent. I was silent because I didn't see anything suspicious about Bob or Charlie last night. Bob, you said you investigated Diana - how can that be if you're the detective? The mafia must still be among us and it could be Alice or someone else..."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
